title: Social Event Discovery – Personalized Recommendations Based on User Interests
summary: As a retired social worker and community volunteer, I want ALFRED to suggest social events tailored to my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Easy Video Call Initiation with Pre-set Favorites
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to quickly initiate video calls with my family and friends using pre-set favorites so that I can maintain social connections despite my reduced mobility.

title: Personalized Engagement Activities – Physical Activities Tailored to User Mobility Levels
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to recommend physical activities that are suitable for my mobility level, so that I can stay active and engaged without exacerbating my arthritis pain.

title: Family and Caregiver Connection – Real-time Health Updates Shared with Caregivers
summary: As an older adult, I want to share real-time health updates with my family and caregivers so that they can stay informed about my well-being and provide the support I need.

title: Support for Social Networks – Encouragement of Participation in Community Services
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest community service opportunities based on my interests and availability, so that I can stay socially connected and continue volunteering despite my limited mobility.

title: User Feedback Loop for Social Features
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to collect my preferences for social activities so that I can stay connected with my community and plan my volunteering schedule more effectively.

title: Cognitive Engagement Reminders – Timely Reminders for Scheduled Activities
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me of my scheduled volunteering activities and social engagements so that I can stay socially connected and remain active despite my reduced mobility.

title: Crisis Response Mechanism
summary: As a retired social worker, I want the ALFRED system to alert my family and caregivers in case of an emergency so that I can feel safe and secure while maintaining my independence.
